title: Reverse Engineering - Crackme
description:
Analyze a compiled binary to find the correct password or license key.

Approach:
- Static analysis with Ghidra/IDA/Binary Ninja
- Dynamic analysis with debugger (gdb, x64dbg)
- Look for string comparisons
- Track input validation logic
- Identify key generation algorithms

Common patterns:
- strcmp/memcmp for password check
- XOR operations for obfuscation
- Mathematical transformations
- Anti-debugging techniques

Tools: Ghidra, radare2/rizin, gdb, ltrace, strace
